Description.0: Nacelles Clustered at the ship's aft.
Description.1: The third largest supercarrier and the last ship built in the second generation.
Description.2: The ship featured a single large hangar space in the center of the ship.
Description.3: This space has multipule smaller launch and retreval bays that are connected by various ship lifts.
Description.4: The ships launch tubes(running along the saucer's rim) connect to the centeral hangar space.
